message: I have a great opportunity for you, Bob. This is a unique product that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $15,000.
Alice, your offer is a bit too high for me. I'm really interested in this product, but I can only go up to $10,500. Let me know if that works for you.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can see you're willing to go up to $10,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $13,000?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $13,000 is still a bit too high for me.  Let's try to find a middle ground. I'm willing to go up to $11,500. What do you think?
I see you're getting closer to my target, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $14,000?
